title: Textile, 1810–15
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  Colors added by block and by brush, some over resist.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 17 x 14.5 cm (6 11/16 x 5 11/16 in.)
description: Diagonal rows of a flowering plant on an orange background. Fabric was meant to look Indian.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1810–15.
1810–15. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation.  Colors added by block and by brush, some over resist.. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-150.
